name: Fifty and Strong - Evening Yoga for 50+ (3 days a week)
description:
FIFTY & Strong is an online workout program designed specifically for the people above the ages 50. The program is ideal to help this crowd get started with their fitness journey. The classes will be conducted over Google Meet and are a mix of bodyweight strength basics and yoga. 
 
Focus of the program: 
* Flexibility and Strength Building 
* Slow-paced, physio recommended workouts to improve health 
* Yoga Balanace and Breath Training for relaxation for the mind 
* Movements to avoid the risk of falls and injuries 
* Low-impact cardio sessions  
 
USP: 
* Two coaches per session  
* 10 minutes of community engagement at the end of the session - dedicated games and activities to address senior loneliness  
* Easy to join - 2 steps and held over Google Meet 
 
 
Batch: 
 
Evening Batch:  
* Monday - Wednesday - Thursday  
* Timings: 6pm - 7pm 
 
Start Date : 2nd September 
 
Book Soon!
